titulo: Study Guide for the U.S. Citizenship and Naturalization Test: 100 Sample Questions and Answers from the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services
descripcion:
Examen para la ciudadanía de los Estados Unidos.
Se convierta un ciudadano de Estados Unidos.
100 preguntas y respuestas del examen de USCIS en Ingles y Espanol.
Los servicios de la ciudadania y del immigration de Estados (USCIS) Administran una prueba verbal a todos los immigrants que solicitan ciudadanía.  
La lista de los seguiente 100 preguntas se ha seleccionado de las preguntas de examines pasados.  
Estudiando estas preguntas no significa que usted obtendra ciudadanía en los Estados Unidos.  
How this audiobook helps prepare for the USCIS exam.
This audiobook presents, in Spanish and English, the 100 official USCIS sample questions and answers for the oral exam one takes for US citizenship.  
People wishing to become US Citizens must take the US Citizenship and Immigration Service (USCIS) oral examination. This audiobook is a study guide to help Spanish- and non-English-speaking individuals study and test their knowledge of US history and the structure of our government. This is not the actual test given by a USCIS officer. At their interview, the USCIS officer may ask them similar questions then evaluated the candidates on their ability to speak, read, write, and understand English at their interview. 
This unique product provides the core base of knowledge even to non-English speaking people so they may partake in the American Dream.  
This audiobook guides these people in their own language by a recording artist who is fluent in both Spanish and English. The audibook, recorded in a state of the art studio, is in a conversational format that speaks to the listener as a friend and equal. 
The audiobook is 38 minutes long with a brief introduction. The exam questions and answers are given in Spanish followed by the English translations and are presented twice. 
Please note: This audiobook is in Spanish and English.
